wikipedia_page.main: Robert Edward Graves (7 November 1942 – 9 March 2021) was an English footballer who made 79 appearances in the Football League playing as a goalkeeper for Lincoln City. He previously played non-league football for Kirton. He died on 9 March 2021.

response: *Bob Graves (footballer) (Robert Edward Graves, born 1942), English football goalkeeper
* 9 March 2021: Bob Graves, 78, Lincoln City goalkeeper.
